title.text: Human Language Technologies for Knowledge Management: Challenges and Opportunities

abstractContent.text: This paper outlines the central role a range of human language technologies play in the emerging discipline of knowledge management.
We articulate several grand challenges, illustrate some early successes, and recommend areas of continued research.

introductionContent.text: In the past few years, knowledge management (KM) has received increasing attention from industry, academia, and government.
Effective KM is often cited as a key capability for competitive advantage for global enterprises.
Human language technology (HLT) plays a central role in KM, as this article aims to elucidate.
